description:
Located in Glendale, California, the Berberian Ain, LLP, law firm has become one of our region's premier legal practices for elder abuse and neglect. Along with advocating on behalf of some of the most vulnerable members of our society, our law firm's attorneys provide invaluable counsel and support to individuals and families that have suffered injuries or losses as the result of motor vehicle accidents, medical malpractice or other preventable tragedies caused by others' negligence or wrongdoing.

Together, our founding partners, attorneys Richard Berberian and Farris Ain, have decades of combined legal experience. During our time in practice, we have gained a reputation for our compassion and integrity when dealing with our clients along with our unwavering dedication to protecting their rights and entitlements and helping them achieve the favorable outcomes they expect and deserve.

Over the course of our history, we have recovered tens of millions of dollars in total compensation for our plaintiff clients, including numerous awards well in excess of a million dollars. Honored for their success, our lawyers have earned consistent top rankings and endorsements from their peers, and our law office has enjoyed numerous testimonials and referrals from our satisfied clients.

To find out more about how we can best assist you during this difficult and uncertain time in your life, you can contact Berberian Ain, LLP, to schedule a free initial consultation. We also offer virtual consultations to help keep you and your loved ones safe and healthy in these trying times.
